summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the contract rezone granted by Ordinance 119855, which amended Plats 29E and 29W, page 89 and 90 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property located at 2201 Aurora Avenue North and the Boston Street right-of-way from Single Family 5000 (SF 5000) to Commercial One with a 65-foot height limit (C1/65'); accepting an Amended Property Use in connection therewith. (Petition of Ray Head; C.F. 299227)
